item.title: Hamed add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Hamed add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I am enough of an artist to draw freely upon my imagination. Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Hamed add a quote by plato
item.description: ": اگه با دلت کسي يا چيزي رو دوست داشتي زياد جدي نگيرش. چون کار دل دوست داشتنه... درست مثل کار چشم که ديدنه ... ولي اگه کسي رو با عقلت دوست داشتي بدون داري چيزي رو تجربه مي کني که اسمش عشق واقعيه" -- plato

item.title: Hamed add a quote by Anthony West
item.description: "Sometimes, the words we speak are not the words we want to say." -- Anthony West

item.title: Hamed add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "You will never be happy if you continue to search for what happiness consists of. You will never live if you are looking for the meaning of life." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Hamed add a quote by Thomas A. Edison
item.description: "I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work." -- Thomas A. Edison

item.title: Hamed add a quote by احمد شاملو / Ahmad Shamloo
item.description: "چراغی در دست چراغی در دلم. زنگار روحم را صیقل می زنم اینه ئی برابر اینه ات می گذارم تا از تو ابدیتی بسازم." -- احمد شاملو / Ahmad Shamloo

item.title: Hamed add a quote by آلبر کامو
item.description: "ترجیح میدهم طوری زندگی کنم که گویی خدا هست و وقتی مُردم بفهمم نیست، تا اینکه طوری زندگی کنم که انگار خدا نیست و وقتی مُردم بفهمم که هست." -- آلبر کامو
